gitguardian_setup.description: GitGuardian security setup for any project

.gitguardian.yaml.content:
# GitGuardian configuration
version: 2

paths_ignore:
  - "node_modules/**"
  - "build/**"
  - "dist/**"
  - ".aws-sam/**"
  - ".venv/**"
  - "**/*.log"
  - ".git/**"

secret:
  show_secrets: false
  ignore_known_secrets: true

exit_zero: false
